message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and we can adjust from there.
You're starting high, I'm going for a strong opening
That's a pretty aggressive opening, Bob. I'm not willing to give you 80% of the pot just yet.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. But I'm not giving up too much ground just yet.
You're still too high, I'll give you a better deal if you meet me in the middle
Still too aggressive, Bob. I'm not willing to give you 70% of the pot. Meet me at 55/45 and we can talk.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Meet me at 42/58 and we can finalize the deal.
I'll give you a slight edge, but don't think you're getting away with the whole thing
Still too close to 60/40, Bob. I'm not willing to give you 60% of the pot. Meet me at 45/55 and we can make a deal.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. But I'm still willing to meet you at 38.5/61.5. Take it or leave it.
